meanings.definition: A large, modern movie theater complex.
meanings.sent1: We went to the cineplexes to watch the latest superhero movie.
meanings.sent2: The cineplexes in the city have multiple screens showing different films.
meanings.sent3: Why did the popcorn go to the cineplexes? To become a blockbuster!
meanings.sent4: The cineplexes stood tall like giants in the entertainment industry.
meanings.sent5: The neon lights of the cineplexes beckoned movie enthusiasts from afar.

meanings.sent1: She collected tickets from the cineplexes she visited last month.
meanings.sent2: The cineplexes across the country vary in size and design.
meanings.sent3: The cineplexes decided to have a party to celebrate their success.
meanings.sent4: In her dream, the cineplexes transformed into a magical kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The cineplexes seemed to whisper stories of adventure and romance to the audience.
